text: To (allaha) asa ahe, jyane suryala tejasvi banavile ani candrala prakasamana banavile ani tyacyasathi sthana (gantavya) nirdharita kele, yasathi ki tumhi varsanci ganana va hisoba lavu sakave va hisobala januna ghyave. Allahane ya sarva vastu vyartha nirmana kelya nahita, to ha purava tyanna spasta sangata ahe je akkala rakhatata
